messages.subject: The 2008 Unschooling Conference - Madison, WI
messages.msgSnippet: Please post to your group, if appropriate. Pass along to others who may be interested: Greetings from the 2008 Unschooling Conference in Madison, Wisconsin.
messages.messageBody:
Please post to your group, if appropriate. Pass along to others who may be interested:

Greetings from the 2008 Unschooling Conference in Madison, Wisconsin.

Our 2007 conference, the first unschooling conference ever in Wisconsin, was a huge success! It was a very energizing and renewing experience. Participants took full advantage of the small size of the conference and the intimate atmosphere to connect and have in-depth conversations with other conference attendees and presenters. Feedback was very enthusiastic, and many people asked for another conference in 2008, so here we go.

The 2008 Unschooling Conference, January 12, will feature a keynote address by Manish Jain of Shikshantar: The Peoplesâ Institute for Rethinking Development and Education, in Udaipur, India. We are looking forward to another exciting and fulfilling day of connecting with unschoolers, and expanding our unschooling horizons.

For more information and to download a registration form, please visit our website: www.unschoolingconference.com. We look forward to seeing everyone in January!

Tanya Cunningham
The Unschooling Conference
www.unschoolingconference.com
